A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a horrible movie\, however\, the action and flow of the movie was kind of all over the place and not in tuned with traditional Star Wars spirit. The story was okay\, not too bad and slightly predictable. Just flat out going to say the movie was not that good\, it will be forgettable. Even more forgettable than the one with Jar Jar. The logic for some parts of the movie was kind of “ehhh\, why didn’t they think of this before?” Type or hind sight 20/20 thought. Not the best of the series of course. I have watched all of the Star Wars episodes but I’m not a what you may consider hard core Star Wars fan. Not sure what they have in store for the final episode in this trilogy so we shall wait and see.
